about_the_game:
While staying at the Ottoman Court, Vlad Tepes Dracula travels to slave markets, dungeons and prisons, recruiting skilled warriors to help him take the Wallachian throne. This is when he hears about a great warrior kept in the dungeons of Edirne.

It is said that he defeated 70 fully armed soldiers while he himself was holding a dagger in each hand. He is a wild beast from Persia, descendant from an old tribe of warriors, mostly feared in those lands. People like him are trained in arms from small age, raised to stare straight into the face of death and charge forward, with no regard for pain or their own life. They are called Hashashin.

Experience a gorgeous Classicvania game drawn in the NES/SNES style, inspired by NES classics like Castlevania I/III, Ninja Gaiden III, Shatterhand etc. Pick up your sword and fight your way through the gorgeous fortress of Edirne, descend into the darkest dungeons and claim the great Hashashin warrior for yourself.

But above all, see the world through the eyes of the legendary Vlad Tepes Dracula, discover the dark side of the story!

The action takes place before Episode 1, so you will discover some interesting connections both in terms of story and characters. It's all part of the big story. If you haven't seen Episode 1, check it out! 

A game by Tiberius

content_descriptors.notes: Medieval sword fighting with impalement as death animation.

detailed_description:
While staying at the Ottoman Court, Vlad Tepes Dracula travels to slave markets, dungeons and prisons, recruiting skilled warriors to help him take the Wallachian throne. This is when he hears about a great warrior kept in the dungeons of Edirne.

It is said that he defeated 70 fully armed soldiers while he himself was holding a dagger in each hand. He is a wild beast from Persia, descendant from an old tribe of warriors, mostly feared in those lands. People like him are trained in arms from small age, raised to stare straight into the face of death and charge forward, with no regard for pain or their own life. They are called Hashashin.

Experience a gorgeous Classicvania game drawn in the NES/SNES style, inspired by NES classics like Castlevania I/III, Ninja Gaiden III, Shatterhand etc. Pick up your sword and fight your way through the gorgeous fortress of Edirne, descend into the darkest dungeons and claim the great Hashashin warrior for yourself.

But above all, see the world through the eyes of the legendary Vlad Tepes Dracula, discover the dark side of the story!

The action takes place before Episode 1, so you will discover some interesting connections both in terms of story and characters. It's all part of the big story. If you haven't seen Episode 1, check it out! 

A game by Tiberius

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris 8th gen or better
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris 8th gen or better
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: The journey of the legendary Vlad Dracula continues through the dark dungeons under the Castle of Edirne, right in the heart of the Ottoman Empire. Experience a gorgeous Classicvania (linear metroidvania) game where you get to be Dracula, the medieval warlord, and see his side of the story!
